Author: Sea_Plane
Text: god, if this aint relatable.. it truly feels like my ED has saved my life sometimes. I nearly killed myself so many times but anorexia made me struggle through it. it's not a good coping mechanism, but it ***is*** a coping mechanism, and it sure as hell works. I think a lot of therapists forget that. I'd be dead without it. I suppose, if anything, it gives me more time to find hope before I die. Sorry if this was really dark, i just. really relate.

Author: janescandycanes
Text: I feel like my ED is keeping me alive too. Hard to describe... Its a sense of control and a form of self harm in one.
